welcome_message_body: Welcome to Santo Domingo, where history and modernity come together in a vibrant mix of colonial charm and lively culture. Explore our historic sites, immerse yourself in our rich heritage, and savor the flavors of our delicious cuisine. Enjoy your stay and make unforgettable memories in our beautiful city!

restaurants.name: Comedor Vip
restaurants.description: Comedor Vip is a caribbean restaurant located in the city.

restaurants.name: Estadero Mall Rancho Grande
restaurants.description: Estadero Mall Rancho Grande is a restaurant located in the city.

restaurants.description: Punto Aparte is a diner located in the city.

restaurants.name: El Llanerito
restaurants.description: El Llanerito is a bbq joint located in Porce.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Dr.Joaquin Balaguer Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Dr.Joaquin Balaguer Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi throughout the airport by connecting to the designated network.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: This terminal serves international flights to and from destinations in North America, South America, and Europe.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic flights within the Dominican Republic.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
